document_data.caption: A map showing the Gentle Rest Stables on Deloun Alley.
document_data.name: Gentle Rest Stables
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gentle Rest Stables''' was a stable located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The stables stood two stories tall.
document_data.Location: The Gentle Rest Stables was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] on both [[Deloun Alley]] and [[Quill Alley]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Volo 5294a}}
document_data.Inhabitants: The stables were ownedby [[Torst Urlivan]] in the {{YearlinkName|1357}}.
